meta.@content: Prototype for ship Running Lights that can be adapted to any surface ship (or surfaced submarine). These are not usable for aircraft, since those lights are omnidirectional.
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

-children.#comment: This node provides standard running lights for vessels > 50 meters in length
Example scene using the ProtoDeclaration follows
